record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - February 26, 2008)

[Page: H1046]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislativ e days within which to revise and extend their remarks on H.R. 3521, and to insert extraneous material thereon.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New Jersey?
